description:
Marlon`s Wailord served as transportation to take Ash, Kotetsu and Marlon to the gym for the battle. Marlon was first revealed in the anime riding on top of his Wailord at it came close to the shore where Ash and Kotetsu were.
None of Marlon`s Wailord`s moves were revealed in the episode.
name: Whaloh (Shizui)
